participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and hardworking, always striving to balance her commitments.
participant_1.background: i am in college to become a nurse. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i don't like chicken.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Family-oriented and humorous, always looking for ways to make his children laugh.
participant_2.background: i have three children. my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i'm a plumber.
